title: Big PC Cases are DEAD to Me. - Dan Cases C4-SFX
description: Better sleep makes a better you! Check out Eight Sleep at  and use code LMG for $150 off!  Save 10% and Free Worldwide Shipping at Ridge by using offer code LINUS at   There are big, good cases that can fit tons of hardware like the Corsair 4000D. There are stylish cases like Lian Li O11 Dynamic. There are cases with great airflow like the Fractal Design Torrent. But it's hard to get all of those in a Small Form Factor of SFF case. DanCase has proven that you DON'T need to compromise on these features and that you can fit a high-end Intel or AMD CPU and even an Nvidia RTX 4090 in one of the best PC cases I've built in. I love this thing.  Discuss on the forum:   Check out the DanCase C4-SFX Mini-ITX Case:  Buy an AMD Ryzen 7 7800 X3D CPU:  Buy a Gigabyte AORUS Radeon RX 7900 XTX GPU:  Buy a Nvidia GeForce 4090 FE GPU:  Buy a Cooler Master V1100 SFX 80+ Platinum PSU:  Buy an ASUS ROG Strix X670E-I Gaming Motherboard:  Buy a NZXT Kraken X63 RGB 280mm AIO Cooler:  Buy G.Skill Trident Z5 RGB 6000Mhz CL30 2x16GB DDR5 RAM:  Buy a Gigabyte AORUS Gen5 10,000 NVMe M.2 SSD:  Buy a Crucial MX500 2TB 2.5" SSD:  Buy a Noctua NF-A14 CPU Cooler:  Buy a Noctua NH-D9L CPU Cooler:  Buy a Noctua NH-D12L CPU Cooler:  Buy a SSUPD Meshroom S Mini-ITX Case:  Buy a Cooler Master NR200P Mini-ITX Case:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   EQUIPMENT WE USE TO FILM LTT:   OUR WAN PODCAST GEAR:   FOLLOW US  ---------------------------------------------------  Twitter:  Facebook:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Twitch:   MUSIC CREDIT --------------------------------------------------- Intro: Laszlo - Supernova Video Link:  iTunes Download Link:  Artist Link:   Outro: Approaching Nirvana - Sugar High Video Link:  Listen on Spotify:  Artist Link:   Intro animation by MBarek Abdelwassaa  Monitor And Keyboard by vadimmihalkevich / CC BY 4.0  Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0  Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:51 Meet The DanCase C4-SFX 3:00 Building in The DanCase  4:40 Motherboard 5:24 PSU and SSD  8:12 CPU Cooler 9:10 GPU Warranty Stickers 9:46 Rad Mount 10:20 Nude GPU 12:03 Trying to fit it all in 15:42 Comparable Cases 16:52 Thermals 19:13 Nitpicks 21:00 Outro
